general.gigTitle: develop and design your professional webflow website

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Certified UX,UI Designer and Webflow Developer
sellerCard.description: Hello! I'm Cindy Martinez, a passionate graphic designer with over 10 years of experience. Alongside my husband, we helm 'Sauce Sites', an agency dedicated to bringing your brand's vision to life. From captivating infographics to intuitive web designs, we've got you covered. Our expertise also extends to Webflow development and crafting efficient dashboards in Notion. Let's transform your ideas into digital masterpieces!

description.content:
Hi, Im Cindy Martinez, a professional Web Designer and Certified Webflow Developer. I create stunning, responsive Webflow websites that help businesses thrive online.


What You'll Get:


Basic Package ($395):

A 1-page responsive Webflow website,

perfect for small businesses.

Includes 1 custom asset and 2 revisions.


Standard Package ($895):

A 3-page Webflow site tailored to your brand,

with mobile optimization,

3 custom assets,

content upload,

and basic SEO.


Premium Package ($1,995):

A 5-page advanced Webflow website with CMS integration,

5 custom assets, plugin setup,

advanced SEO,

and unlimited revisions.


Why Choose Me?

  • Certified Webflow Expertise
  • Custom solutions tailored to your needs
  • Timely delivery with regular updates
  • Revisions included for your satisfaction


Let's create your perfect website! DM me to get started.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Orders are in queue! Can you manage to develop my Website on time?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No worries, I have a streamlined process for creating websites, but to be sure, you can always message me.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Select a package that best fits your needs! After you confirm the order, you will be transferred to a quick questionnaire, where you can submit all the information I need from you, to deliver an excellent Website.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is your process like?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I use the Agile collaborative process with draft sprints. Usually, a few draft iterations are required to ensure the best results and achievement of your business goals.

packageList.title: Starter Webflow Website
packageList.description: A 1-page responsive site, perfect for small businesses needing a quick online presence.

packageList.title: Business Webflow Website
packageList.description: A 3-page site designed for growing businesses with mobile optimization and SEO.

packageList.title: Advanced Webflow Website
packageList.description: A 5-page site with custom design, plugins, advanced SEO, and post-launch support.

openGraph.title: develop and design your professional webflow website

reviews.comment: It was a highly constructive and enjoyable experience. The freelancer was extremely communicative, creative, and proactive, bringing her own ideas and solutions to the table. We achieved our goal right from the first design draft. Her response time and delivery were impressively fast. I truly appreciate her work and can highly recommend her.
Great work and communication. Thank you very much!

seller_response.comment: Thank you for the feedback it was an amazing collaboration, looking forward to the next one!
